items.content_html: SnapShare is a lightweight social media app built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js). This app allows users to post stories, share posts with friends, and connect with others in a simple, intuitive interface.

items.content_html: The `http-easy` package provides a lightweight and intuitive API for making HTTP requests in Node.js applications. It abstracts away the complexities of the HTTP protocol, offering simplified methods for common HTTP operations like GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and more
